\DoxyCodeLine{00070\ \textcolor{comment}{\ *\ '.'\ -\/\ match\ any\ single\ character}}
\DoxyCodeLine{00071\ \textcolor{comment}{\ *\ '\#'\ -\/\ match\ any\ digit}}

\DoxyCodeLine{00073\ \textcolor{comment}{\ *\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ supported)}}
\DoxyCodeLine{00074\ \textcolor{comment}{\ *\ Return\ val:\ 0\ if\ the\ pattern\ is\ not\ found.\ Nonzero\ if\ it\ is\ found\ (actually,}}
\DoxyCodeLine{00075\ \textcolor{comment}{\ *\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ x\ +\ 1\ where\ x\ is\ the\ index\ where\ the\ match\ is\ found).}}
